subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] Spiraling out of control- Enough of the namecalling and fighting!!
author: bruce halliday
full_text:

Content-Type: text/plain; charset="iso-8859-1"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

Frank,
 
I do daily research with box #12 and never use random mode, I have=
 never gotten a clear
message from random. I find through trial and error t=
hat the AM linear mode serves as the 
best mode for real time and recorded =
communication. I have also been testing the RS box 
frequently and it seems=
 that the AM band works best. I have confermed this with my guides and they=
 agree AM linear
serves the best.
 
bruce

Bruce Halliday Paranormal Invest=
igating Team  


To: evp-itc@yahoogroups.comFrom: franks-boxes@...=
ate: Mon, 3 Dec 2007 08:13:31 -0700Subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] Spiraling out of =
control- Enough of the namecalling and fighting!!




 Yeah, I am the maste=
r! But... that's only when the Ol' Lady ain't looking over my shoulder! I h=
ave to tell everyone--she's pissed!!!! Way too much time in the basement, a=
nd way to much money spent on something she considers useless.  I'm rushing=
 on yet another proto type, one that gets rid of random mode, and has all f=
unctions, linear, with direct voice mode, or though a sound chamber. Then--=
-it's time to play with tones.   Random mode, depsite the professed theory =
out there, no longer works for me, maybe it's psychological, but the damn c=
ircuits won't even function. Random in the #24 box would not work at all at=
 the Stanley, so I' am abandoning that function. I know what Moon claims ab=
out the raw having to be random--simply not true, that was based on my assu=
mptions about how the box worked in the early days of boxology.   Frank-S

=

To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.comFrom: bulletbabea@...: Sun, 2 Dec 200=
7 18:26:41 -0800Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Spiraling out of control- Enough of =
the namecalling and fighting!!



To ALL members of this group,
I agree wit=
h Steve. Ive told you all this many times yet some of you like to get caugh=
t up in the heat of the moment.
 
It is very disturbing to watch you all tr=
y to win this war of words. There is no winner just a bunch of losers. And =
while you are busy losing theres no GOOD research being performed by YOU.
 =

How much research did YOU do today? How much time did you spend firing off=
 replies to attempt to respond to someone you dont even know about somethin=
g that doesnt even involve YOU? How much time did you spend replying to joi=
n in the arguments you feel do involve YOU?
 
The point being, this is a re=
search group for ITC not a boxing room and definitely your own personal bat=
tlegrounds. Take that elsewhere. Healthy discussion is one thing but I have=
 seen very few people offering that. In fact I know a few of you joined her=
e just to go after someone who ticked you off. Then there are those who jus=
t seem to be firing in all directions, taget doesnt matter.
 
Get a grip pe=
ople!! Ive seen 4 year olds with more self control. If you arent interested=
 in researching ITC for yourself then what the heck are YOU doing HERE. 
 
=
ONCE AGAIN THIS IS AN ITC RESEARCH GROUP!! 
 
As for the box Frank is and a=
lways has been the first/primary tester of any box he has built. 
 
lol
Mis=
ty
 
P.S. I think you all are capable of finding better things to do, if no=
t let me know and I will give you a few ideas =3D)
Steve Hultay <urkel23@ao=
l.com> wrote:


I think we should all focus at the research at hand and for=
get what everyone else is doing. I personally know Chris and think he's a g=
reat guy and frank feels the same way most days. This has gotten to the poi=
nt where i can't even do a session anymore because i'm so blocked by negati=
ve thoughts from this group it's pointless to concentrate on the box and ge=
t results. Honestly who cares what chris does anyway, does it really affect=
 everyone's lives that much. I have a job and this is a hobby that i used t=
o really like, but now this board has brought me down. It seems all people =
want to do is make this like a street fight with challenges and negative vi=
ews and for what reason? If anyone is concerned about hearing Chris's audio=
, i have about 2 hours of box sessions from Eastern State on my web site fo=
r all to listen to. It's www.keyportparanormal.com and go to investigation =
and click on eastern state. All the audio is at the bottom of that page and=
 you guys can judge for yourself and i heard a lot come out of that box tha=
t night personally because i repeated a lot of stuff back to chris that i h=
eard. Enough already, let's move on to the next great thing. That radio sha=
ck hack was a great breakthrough here, let's just be happy we got that befo=
re it was shut down. Now we have another avenue to go down, but we can't do=
 it with all these negatives out there. Let's move on to new topics and any=
one out there that bought a Radio Shack box, start sharing your files with =
the group so it's not just us same 5 that post all the time.-Steve H.


Be =
a better sports nut! Let your teams follow you with Yahoo Mobile. Try it no=
w.

ile counts. The more smiles you share, the more we donate.=A0 Join in.
